name: Robot Escape (rushork)
description:
You're a robot that has just escaped a facility, run from the electrical fog that is chasing you and escape through the doors to safety.

This is my 3rd game, it's a WIP and this is just a demo with 3 levels and the basic mechanics for now.

There are some visual bugs with the UI depending on whether you are in fullscreen or not, for the best experience do not use the fullscreen button because it causes some FPS drop.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Reviews + feedback is appreciated in the comments :D
